INSERT INTO dr_member_favourable(uid,activityId,type,code,name,amount,profitAmount, raisedRates,multiple,productDeadline,enableAmount,`status`,source,remark,expireDate,user_key,addtime)
select m.uid,a.ID,a.type,a.`code`,a.`name`,a.amount,0, a.raisedRates,1, a.productDeadline,a.enableAmount,0,2,'运营发放',DATE_ADD(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL (a.deadline-1) DAY),#{uid},SYSDATE() from dr_manuallySend_coupon c, dr_member m, dr_activity_parameter a where c.cirId = #{cirId} and c.status = 1 and c.mobilePhone = m.mobilePhone and DATE_FORMAT(c.addTime,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{addTime},'%Y%m%d') and FIND_IN_SET(a.id,c.coupons) order by m.mobilePhone
